post_title: Ltb epdg, Tolstoi, cycle or AB
post_content: Would like to buy a beater common or 2, prefer raw of those tougher backs. Thank you :)

Hi,
I have a pretty decent Slagle Cycle 350 available for sale. It’s a raw card and has a small spot of missing paper on the front. If you are interested, send me your email and I will shoot over a couple scans. I’m asking $200

Thanks and Talk Soon,
Colton
